name: Function.mulSupport_along_fiber_finite_of_finite
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
γ : Type u_3
inst✝ : One γ
f : Prod α β → γ
a : α
h : (Function.mulSupport f).Finite
⊢ (Function.mulSupport fun b => f { fst := a, snd := b }).Finite
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp)]
lemma mulSupport_along_fiber_finite_of_finite (f : α × β → γ) (a : α) (h : (mulSupport f).Finite) :
    (mulSupport fun b ↦ f (a, b)).Finite :=
  (h.image Prod.snd).subset (mulSupport_along_fiber_subset f a)

name: Function.support_along_fiber_finite_of_finite
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
γ : Type u_3
inst✝ : Zero γ
f : Prod α β → γ
a : α
h : (Function.support f).Finite
⊢ (Function.support fun b => f { fst := a, snd := b }).Finite
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp)]
lemma mulSupport_along_fiber_finite_of_finite (f : α × β → γ) (a : α) (h : (mulSupport f).Finite) :
    (mulSupport fun b ↦ f (a, b)).Finite :=
  (h.image Prod.snd).subset (mulSupport_along_fiber_subset f a)
